channel.title: 2006 Remade / Working Cats / Easter Ring / Random Events / All Skills / JAGEX LI
channel.description:
2006 rs just like the old days almost jagex like if you have ever played 2006 rs this will remind you of the good times with [U]perfect working ancient spells and ice barrage freezing[/U]
first 10 to join get a free full dragon set to help them out
[b]Latest update's:[/b] - Glass making - Battlestaff making (air, water, earth and fire) - Can't mage/range through walls - Rock golem, River troll, Tree spirit, Shade and Zombie random's. - Bird's nest & All tree's cut-able
[b]Combat:[/b] - PvP fully complete - PvN fully Complete - Equipment requirements - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula
[b]Magic:[/b] - Every Modern spell - Every Ancient spell - Can't mage through wall's
[b]Range:[/b] - All bow/arrow's working - Can't range through walls - Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)
[b]Prayer:[/b] - All bones bury-able - All prayer's working correctly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[b]Mining:[/b] - Empty and refilling rock's - All ore can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animation's - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gem's - Rune essence - Granite - SandStone
[b]Smithing:[/b] - All bar's can be smelted - All bar's can be forged into item's - All equipment can be produced - Correct animation's, interface's and object's used
[b]Fishing:[/b] - All fish can be caught - All fishing location's - Correct animation's - Moving fishing location's
[b]Cooking:[/b] - Bread - Pizza - Pie - Cake - Stew - Wine - Tea - Brewing - Potatoes - Diary - Gnome - Dough making - Meat/fish - Correct animation and timing used - Correct burn rate
[b]Woodcutting:[/b] - All tree's cut-able - Stumps and re-growing tree's - Correct axe finding and animation's - Bird's nest
[b]Firemaking:[/b] - All log's light-able - Correct ground object's - Correct animation's - Ashe's
[b]Crafting:[/b] - Leather crafting - Tanning - Spinning wheel - Pottery (fired and un-fired item's) - Gem cutting - Jewelry - Glass making - Battlestaff making (air, water, earth and fire) - Weaving
[b]Runecrafting:[/b] - All altar's working - Correct multiple crafting - Talisman's "pull" to altar's - Tiara's - Pouch's - Abyss
[b]Fletching:[/b] - All log's can be fletched - Bow stringing - Arrow/dart making
[b]Thieving:[/b] - Stall thieving - Pick-pocketing - Correct re-spawn time
[b]Herblore:[/b] - All potion's make-able - Identifying herbs - Weapon poisoning
[b]Slayer:[/b] - All slayer master's - All slayer Monster's - Slayer gem - Slayer shop - Slayer level to attack slayer monster's
[b]Agility:[/b] - none
[b]Farming:[/b] - Some
[b]Music & sounds:[/b] - All skilling sound's - All combat sound's - Working music player and unlocking - Music playing in all region's - Music fade and volume control
[b]Random events:[/b] - Rock golem, River troll, Tree spirit, Shade and Zombie random's drunken dwarf. genie, jekyll, sandwich lady
[b]Misc:[/b] - Pick-able's - Flour mill - Door's, gate's, stair's and ladder's - Global drop's - Sheep shearing - Clipping
Website: [url=http://2006-remade.tk/]http://2006-remade.tk/[/url]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/20s6hb7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2q8yj2e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/9ie14y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/no5v8i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/pua1g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1z2noeu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/kd4lcg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/303ig7t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/6tpsuf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/1zqvubc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/qogilv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2nktphg.png[/IMG

item.title: 2006 Remade / Working Cats / Easter Ring / Random Events / All Skills / JAGEX LI
item.dc:creator: @EliteHackers EliteHackers
item.description:
@EliteHackers wrote:

i thought maybe people would like 2006 rs cool thing is its almost like 2006 and all the skills seem to work even the random events are great haha

and the pet cats work great even come back to you when you relog

Read full topic
